Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: April W.
Reviews.Content: I really like the phone. It is fast and slim. The only problem I have is that the white color was not available and i had to get black. But that is ok.It also works with my plan (page plus).

Reviews.Title: Bang for the Buck!
Reviews.Author: J. DeNagy
Reviews.Content: Came quickly, refurbished with minor blemishes but otherwise a great phone for cheap!  All accessories included.  Been using constantly for weeks, no issues at all!  Totally satisfied!

Reviews.Title: Great device
Reviews.Author: Jon
Reviews.Content: Although not the best smartphone out there, It's definitively good. A little small for me, but it works great. The 3 star review that someone else left for the phone was only 3 stars because they had some problems with the seller.

Reviews.Title: Phone or Glitch?
Reviews.Author: BL
Reviews.Content: I'm going to redo this review as it seems it was a glitch with the phone it has been rebooted and is now working but it took a major reboot to get it running again.  While frustrating we'll see how it goes. Its my daughters replacement phone for one she broke and watching all the issues she's had with Motorola phones over the past year makes me glad I'm not the one using one.  The seller has been very helpful from the beginning of the purchase to this glitch.

Reviews.Title: nice phone
Reviews.Author: Myron
Reviews.Content: Looks good, thin, light weight. Didn't want to upgrade and lose my unlimited data plan, this works great. I'd recommend

Reviews.Title: Very pleased.
Reviews.Author: John Bouman
Reviews.Content: Broke my "new" phone and a friend recommended picking up a used one on-line.  After some research I found the same model with same features at a fair price.  With some hesitation I placed the order.  It arrived quickly, was exactly what I expected, and after a brief visit to the local Verizon store, I was back in business.  That was a month ago and I've had no problems.  It's been working like a champ.

Reviews.Title: not a good experience
Reviews.Author: katy t
Reviews.Content: Phone came quickly.. but it was broken.definitely not a "new" phone which is really disappointing when you pay $200 for something. also no owners manual came with it so I had to figure the phone out with no help.I will not order from these people again.id have been better off getting a phone from Verizon themselves.and they sent me the completely wrong charger for my phone!!! If it was a new phone why would it have a wrong charger??

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Sandra Lopez
Reviews.Content: The phone works good it's just the charger that came with it broke right away. Not the best charger, but phone is good.

Reviews.Title: didn't get a new phone as described - it was refurbished
Reviews.Author: Kevin D Dawes
Reviews.Content: I thought I was buying a new phone, but it turns out that it must have been refurbished because when I received it, it had dings and scratches on it. It did not come in an original box like my old phone did (same model). I didn't return it because I needed the phone for business. I will not buy from this company again.

Reviews.Title: Thank you
Reviews.Author: Jose Luis Garcia Villalona
Reviews.Content: Excellent phone, it condition are aceptable, aplication, resolution, disigne and other apps that it cotein. In future adquisition I thot in motorola and accesory.

ProductInfo.Features:
3G/4G LTE connectivity, Android 4.0 (Ice Cream Sandwich); upgradeable to Android 4.1 (Jelly Bean)
1.5 GHz dual-core processor, 4.3-inch edge-to-edge Super AMOLED display (960 x 540), 8 GB memory + microSD expansion (up to 32 GB)
8-MP camera, HD 1080p video capture, Front-facing camera with HD 720p video, Wireless-N Wi-Fi + Bluetooth 4.0
Mobile Hotspot capable
Up to 20 hours of usage time
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola DROID RAZR M, White 8GB, No Contract (Verizon Wireless)
